title: hirenshukla2017
author: hirenshukla2017
content: Has anybody have experienced in developing decentralize exchange with minimum effort??Like white lable or some short of partnership.To earn some passive income from swap commission.Do anyone have idea about it??

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: I have no personal experience in building a "Dex", but it can be easily done if you know solidity and basic programming.You can use Uniswap's factory and router contract code.You can even use uniswap's front endhttps://github.com/Uniswap/interfaceYou got everything you need for freeÂ  Follow this guide to know how Uniswap contracts work https://cryptomarketpool.com/how-do-the-uniswap-solidity-smart-contracts-work/Make sure to test everything out on a testchain first.Good luck!
